post.summary: A user or campaign owner can create a payment method
post.description: A user or campaign owner can create a payment method which will aid the admin to transfer funds earned by the user to them

account_type.example: momo/bank => This will define the payload structure. if the user chooses momo, the account_number and bank name is expected to be an empty string and vice versa if the account type is bank

account_name.example: John Doe => required for both bank and momo account_type

bank name.example: Ecobank required only when the account type is bank

account_number.example: 424242424242424242 => account number is required when the account type is bank

200.description: User Payment method created successfully

400.description: Error during the processing of the request=>Bad request
